title: Corsicana / Mantisgrove

title: Morgan McHugh
description: Morgan McHugh is an indie folk singer-songwriter from Bellingham WA. title: Andy Mandabach + Gabe Hazleton (Jazz)
description: Both Andy and Gabe are CU Boulder music students with a deep musical connection, experimenting in new electronic sounds while also honoring the long tradition of jazz behind them.
